Class HeroGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • HeroGUI

  • public class HeroGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the hero tile and its movement properties within the map Selects the hero tile icon, and then loads in the hero tile directional tiles. Every time hero tile is moved in the map
    Version:
    May 25, 2015
    Author:
    Edward,David,Oliver, Period: 6, Assignment: ARPEGGIO
